content.rendered:
French Bee, formerly French Blue,[3] is a French low-cost, long-haul airline based at Paris Orly Airport. It operates a scheduled network between France and worldwide leisure destinations.

French Bee official website: https://www.frenchbee.com/en

French Bee flight booking | flight cancellation contact

  • Make a reservation by phone
  • Change or cancel an existing reservation
  • Ask a question about a reservation
  • Add products and services to your reservation

French Bee Customer care number

Phone: 1-833-376-7158 (toll free number) from the USA.
Opening time: 8am – 5pm (UTC -7), from monday to saturday.
French Bee Airline Postal address:
Write at : Service Relations Clientele FRENCH BEE – BP 29054 – 30 971 NIMES CEDEX

French Bee Ticket desk: French bee sales counter Orly Sud Airport (Level 0 in front of Door C):

Open Monday through to Sunday and bank holidays
Beginning at 6:30am

French bee travel shop Roland Garros Airport:

Open Monday through to Sunday and bank holidays
from 9.30am to 1pm and from 2pm to 7pm

French Bee Group Booking Contact

Groups from the Metropolis: groupes-paris@frenchbee.com

Groups from Reunion island : groupes@frenchbee.com

Groups from Papeete, Tahiti : groupes-ppt@frenchbee.com

French Bee Freight Service

Freight Service from Paris Orly: Hi Line Cargo

Hours : from monday to friday, from 9am to 12.30pm and from 2pm à 6pm.

Freight Service from Reunion island : Lindmark Aviation

Hours : from monday to friday, from 8am to 12am and from 1pm to 4pm.

French Bee Airline Baggage Allowance

French Bee Airline Baggage

Travel while pregnant in French Bee

French Bee and Pregnancy

Expectant mothers can travel in French Bee upto the 6th month of the pregnancy.

Between the 6th and 8th month of the pregnancy

At this stage, pregnant women must provide a medical certificate at check-in counter. Medical certificate states that she is fit to travel and there is no complications and the certificate must have been issued in the seven (7) days prior to the journey.

For more details, visit https://www.frenchbee.com/en/general-terms-sale-carriage
